subject: Re: [junit] Error while running junits

p10_sri wrote:
> Hi all,
> 
> I have been trying to run the junit tests from Ant but whenever I
> runs the ant command I encounters the following errors:
> 
> [junit] Running test.com.galileo.fares.llpf.util.propval.AllTests
>     [junit] java.lang.NoSuchMethodError:
> junit.framework.TestCase.name()Ljava/lang/String;
>     [junit]     at
> org.apache.tools.ant.taskdefs.optional.junit.XMLJUnitResultFormatter.
> startTest(XMLJUnitResultFormatter.java:186)

You are building your application with a later version of JUnit than the 
version you are running with in Ant. Check the two class paths.
--
